data.title: Bethany Joy Lenz (Actress)
data.meta_description: Bethany Joy Lenz is an American actress, singer-songwriter, and filmmaker best known for her role as Haley James Scott on the television series One Tree Hill...
data.text:
Profession: Actress

Biography: Bethany Joy Lenz is an American actress, singer-songwriter, and filmmaker best known for her role as Haley James Scott on the television series One Tree Hill (2003â€“2012). In addition to her acting career, Lenz has also released several albums and singles as a solo singer-songwriter and with the band Everly.

After her time on One Tree Hill, Lenz appeared in a variety of television shows, including Dexter (2012), Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D. (2015), and Grey's Anatomy (2018). She also starred in the Hallmark Channel movie The Christmas Secret (2014) and the Lifetime film Snowed-Inn Christmas (2017). As a director, Lenz made her debut with the short film Grace (2016).

Born: April 2, 1981

Birthplace: Hollywood, Florida, USA

Age: 43 years old
